results.title: Energy efficient light
results.creator_credit: Mark Poole, John R. Hipwell, Commonwealth Department of Primary Industries and Energy and Gas and Fuel Corporation of Victoria
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Energy management in commercial buildings”.
Designed as one of a series of videos commissioned by the Commonwealth Department of Primary Industries and Energy and the Gas and Fuel Corporation of Victoria, this video looks at ways commercial building owners, operators and managers can save energy and the environment. This episode looks at lighting consumption and illumination, lamps, lighting and luminairies. Control systems are explored as well as effective strategies for improving the efficiency of existing systems and energy efficient alternatives.

results.title: Meanings are in people
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: David Berlo uses dramatic re-enactments to show how misunderstandings occur when managers and subordinates are at cross purposes

results.title: Loads on structures
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: Robert Heller discusses static and dynamic loads. He describes the deformations and stresses that they are produced by dynamic oscillation and presents news footage which shows the disastrous effects of loads on structures. Includes scenes of the collapse of the Tacoma Narrows bridge;”Years 7-12”

results.title: Job enrichment in action
results.brief_description: “Summary: frederick herzberg explains that according to his motivation-hygiene theory, it is the job content which is directly related to motivation, and that job content must be enriched to allow more responsibility and encourage individual achievement. uses an actual case to point out some of the most common problems of successful job enrichment”

results.title: Indian family : modern Mayan
results.brief_description: “Summary: shows the life of a Mexican Indian family in calipash, where the Indians live in much the same way as did their Mayan ancestors. centres on the father who is a teacher in the local school and an important man in the community”

results.title: India : population 600 million
results.brief_description: “SUMMARY: A review of efforts to introduce family planning to India indicates that poverty in the rural areas is the major problem and until it is controlled to some extent there seems little hope of a successful implementation of any form of birth control in these areas”
results.description: “SUMMARY: A review of efforts to introduce family planning to India indicates that poverty in the rural areas is the major problem and until it is controlled to some extent there seems little hope of a successful implementation of any form of birth control in these areas”

results.title: Gregor Mendel
results.brief_description: “Summary: R.M. Eakin dramatizes the discoveries, method of study, theory & personal philosophy of scientist gregor mendel. explains his interest in heredity and why he selected the edible pea for his experiments”

results.title: Electric fields and moving media
results.brief_description: “Summary: this fils is one of a series concerned with fields and forces as they interact with deformable media. here is presented a study of a group of experiments which focus attention on the simple types of electromechanical interactions relevant to both natural phenomenon such as lighting and complex technological achievements exemplified by The Van De Graff Generator. Narrated by james r. melcher”
